input_text:
Job Title: Senior Accountant

Location: Nashville, TN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
Our partner, a property firm in Nashville, is immediately seeking a Senior Accountant. This position will play a crucial role in supporting the Controller by managing the Accounts Receivable and Accounts Payable teams. The ideal candidate will have a bachelorâ€™s degree in accounting and 5+ years of experience in accounting.

Senior Accountant Responsibilities: 

Direct, develop and oversee daily responsibilities for the Billing, Receivables, Collections and Payables team members Works as a liaison for Homeowners and Property Managers on company policy relating to the accounting process (i.e., homeowner payment concerns, delinquency issues and filing process, etc.) Assist with any escalated HOA concerns for managers and owners to find acceptable solutions and timely follow through Oversee the process of customer billings for all business segments such as Monthly Assessments, Special Assessments, Homeowner Statements accurately and in a timely fashion Oversee and manage the timeliness and quality control of HOA Payments received to include accurate GL account coding, avoiding duplicate payments, entering payables and verifying payee contact Review and manage delinquency process and assist and manage setup, deliverables and reporting concerning collections 

Senior Accountant Requirements: 

Bachelor's degree in accounting, finance or related field 5+ years proven experience in accounting, with property experience preferred 1+ years of experience supervising a team Excellent organizational, problem solving and strategic thinking skills 

If this position interests you, please apply today!

Thank you,

Rachel Stewart

Project Manager

LaSalle Network

LaSalle Network is an Equal Opportunity Employer m/f/d/v.

LaSalle Network is the leading provider of direct hire and temporary staffing services. For over two decades, LaSalle has helped organizations hire faster and connect top talent with opportunities, from entry-level positions to the C-suite. With units specializing in Accounting and Finance, Administrative, Marketing, Technology, Supply chain, Healthcare Revenue Cycle, Call Center, Human Resources and Executive Search. LaSalle offers staffing and recruiting solutions to companies of all sizes and across all industries. LaSalle Network is the premier staffing and recruiting firm, earning over 100 culture, revenue and industry-based awards from major publications and having its company experts regularly contribute insights on retention strategies, hiring trends and hiring challenges, and more to national news outlets.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Senior Accountant
output_json.summary: Immediate opening for a Senior Accountant at a property firm in Nashville, TN.
preferred_degrees: Bachelor's degree in accounting, finance or related field
soft_skills: Excellent organizational, problem solving and strategic thinking skills

Works as a liaison for Homeowners and Property Managers on company policy relating to the accounting process
Assist with any escalated HOA concerns for managers and owners to find acceptable solutions and timely follow through
Oversee the process of customer billings for all business segments such as Monthly Assessments, Special Assessments, Homeowner Statements accurately and in a timely fashion
Oversee and manage the timeliness and quality control of HOA Payments received to include accurate GL account coding, avoiding duplicate payments, entering payables and verifying payee contact
Review and manage delinquency process and assist and manage setup, deliverables and reporting concerning collections
